arts.ttl: Wolves move off bottom with first victory of the season
arts.sum: Southampton left-back Ryan Manning had a goal overturned by the referee 10 minutes later following a VAR review, but Matheus Cunha ’s stunning strike early in the second half ended hopes of a Saints comeback. Wolves were made to wait until their 11th match to get the first win of the Premier League season, but it has come at a good time.

arts.ttl: 'I don't sweat my future' - Martin defiant as Saints lose again
arts.sum: Why Southampton boss Russell Martin remains calm despite nine defeats in 11 games leaving them bottom of the Premier League.

arts.ttl: O'Neil praises 'gritty' Wolves performance after first win
arts.sum: Wolverhampton Wanderers 2-0 Southampton: Wolves manager Gary O'Neil talks to MOTD's Gary Lineker

arts.ttl: Russell Martin points the finger of blame after VAR controversy in Southampton loss
arts.sum: Southampton had a goal chalked off by VAR in their 2-0 defeat at Wolves in a crucial game at the bottom of the Premier League - but Russell Martin blamed his players for the loss

arts.ttl: Premier League roundup: Fulham into top six, Wolves earn first win, West Ham struggle
arts.sum: There were four Premier League kick-offs at 3pm, with Fulham, Brentford and West Ham among the teams in action.
Southampton boss Russell Martin is frustrated that his side "completely dominated the ball" but still suffered a 2-0 defeat at Premier League relegation rivals Wolves.

arts.ttl: Pablo Sarabia and Matheus Cunha on target as Wolves secure first win
arts.sum: Southampton are bottom of the table heading into the international break.

Southampton looked to be back level within ten minutes when some scrappy play in the box led to the ball falling at the feet of an unmarked Manning, who hammered home, but the decision was overturned by VAR for a foul on Nelson Semedo. A Southampton free-kick had Wolves defending their box and when the ball eventually came in from the left, Taylor Harwood-Bellis headed across goal, but Jorgen Strand-Larsen was well positioned to see out the danger.

arts.ttl: Premier League issue statement on latest VAR controversy in Wolves vs Southampton
arts.sum: Ryan Manning thought he had equalised for Southampton in their Premier League match at Wolves, only for referee Thomas Bramall to overturn the decision after consulting VAR

arts.ttl: West Ham v Everton, Wolves v Southampton, and more: clockwatch – live
arts.sum: Updates from Premier League 3pm kick-offs and more Live scores | Share your thoughts with Dom via email Game over. Lewis Baker with a bolt from the blue for Blackburn on the break. 3-1 and that will sink the home side. Cardiff 1-2 Blackburn: This cracking game is now getting the cracking finale it deserves, with Cardiff now piling on the pressure in search of an equaliser. John Eustace is wearing a worried look on the touchline as his team try to keep out the baying Bluebirds. Five minutes to go plus addeds. Continue reading...
